sources.title: Boy of the Streets
sources.description: A young teen in New York City grapples with a deadbeat father, and the law of the big city streets.

sources.title: Boy of the Streets (1937) JACKIE COOPER
sources.description:
Stars: Jackie Cooper, Maureen O'Connor, Kathleen Burke 
Director: William Nigh

In this urban drama, when tough streek punk gets involved in the graft and corruption of his local city government, he gets shot by a gangster. He survives and decides to forego the crooked path for the straight and narrow. Co-stars Kathleen Burke THE PANTHER WOMAN from Island of Lost Souls (1932).

metadata.Plot: Cocky young street kid worships his father, a sleazy political operative.
metadata.Writer: Gilson Brown, Scott Darling, Rowland Brown
metadata.Actors: Jackie Cooper, Maureen O'Connor, Kathleen Burke
